scripts.build_py_macos: source py/.venv/bin/activate && pip freeze && echo $PYTHONPATH && yes | pyinstaller --hidden-import pydantic --add-data "py/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/langchain/chains/llm_summarization_checker/prompts/create_facts.txt:py/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/langchain/chains/llm_summarization_checker/prompts/" --additional-hooks-dir=py/hooks  --distpath src-tauri/bin/python --clean -n test-x86_64-apple-darwin py/test.py
scripts.build_py_macos2: source py/.venv/bin/activate && pip freeze && echo $PYTHONPATH && yes | pyinstaller --onefile --add-data "py/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/langchain/chains/llm_summarization_checker/prompts/create_facts.txt" --additional-hooks-dir=py/hooks  --distpath src-tauri/bin/python --clean -n test-x86_64-apple-darwin py/test.py
scripts.oxidize: source py/.venv/bin/activate && cd py && pyoxidizer build
scripts.build_macos_simple: cd py && source .venv/bin/activate && yes | pyinstaller --distpath ../src-tauri/bin/python --clean -n test-x86_64-apple-darwin test.py
